widget.name: AutoPrivateTab
widget.description: Automatically re-opens URLS containing keywords in private or pinned tabs. The matching URL itself will still appear in history etc, however it provides a nice way to automatically use a specific jump page for private browsing.
widget.author: Rob Emery
